reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's lectures are incredibly engaging. She explains complex concepts with clarity and enthusiasm.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson brings history to life with his storytelling. However, his assignments can be quite demanding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's passion for biology is contagious. Her lab sessions are particularly well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee knows his subject well, but sometimes struggles to explain concepts to non-math majors.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Green's classes are always thought-provoking. She encourages critical thinking and class participation.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's experiments are fascinating, but his lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Wang is an excellent teacher who makes coding accessible and fun. Her office hours are incredibly helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems disinterested in teaching. His feedback on essays is minimal and unhelpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's classes are eye-opening. She presents diverse perspectives on social issues.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson knows his subject well, but his teaching style can be confusing for beginners.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White's passion for art is inspiring. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Smith encourages lively debates in class. His assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor explains complex brain functions in an understandable way. Her research insights are fascinating.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's lectures can be hard to follow. However, his reading list is excellent and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez's field trips make learning about ecosystems exciting. She's also very approachable outside of class.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is a skilled musician and teacher. His ear training exercises are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Patel makes complex genetic concepts easy to understand. Her enthusiasm for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Film Studies
reviews.review: Prof. Turner often seems unprepared for lectures. The course feels disorganized and lacks structure.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's classes are fascinating. She brings in real-world examples that make language study come alive.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov has extensive knowledge but can be intimidating. His grading is quite harsh.
